survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Meal Kit Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their experience with subscription-based meal kit services, focusing on quality, convenience, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using a subscription-based meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the options cover all possible durations.
